title: (x) "Gloria" logo for a bar - Einhorn {Mike Y}
content:
![gloria](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142702im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26809.jpg)   
   
i like it, i've seen it before, but i can't name it. thanks: lars
author: lars

comments.content: Letraset Einhorn that has been slanted.
Heres a link to [ITC Einhorn](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142702/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=358707) (it's new name). Salut is similar, but has a closed 'a'.
indeed! thanks mike (5 mins, not so bad \*g\*)
